message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.IR. 

This paper discusses the limitations of security questions and proposes the use of system-generated fictitious profiles to answer them. This topic is closely related to computer security (cs.CR) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper also discusses the usability of the proposed solution, which falls under the category of social and information sciences (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper discusses the need to enhance security questions, which could fall under the categories of cybersecurity (cs.CY) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
